title.text: The Development of Multimodal Lexical Resources

abstractContent.text: Human communication is a multimodal activity, involving not only speech and written expressions , but intonation, images, gestures, visual clues, and the interpretation of actions through perception.
In this paper, we describe the design of a multimodal lexicon that is able to accommodate the diverse modalities that present themselves in NLP applications.
We have been developing a multimodal semantic representation, VoxML, that integrates the encoding of semantic, visual, gestural, and action-based features associated with linguistic expressions.
